properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
M/V IMBRE I, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO LACK OF FUEL
IN 35-41N 028-26E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC PIRAEUS, TELEX: 601211588, 601211254,
PHONE: 3021 0411 2500, 3021 0422 0772,
FAX: 3021 0413 2398, 3021 0411 5798.
